TopicTitle: How to get extra funds in debug menu (Linux)??

Articles.Content:
I am well aware about the debug menu now and how to open it (right SHIFT+F12) in Linux.

But how do you get the additional perk to obtain extra funds, science, etc?

In the windows version all you had to do was click on the ALT key for 5 seconds or so and it would appear, in Linux this doesn't seem to happen.

Any suggestions?

The key is different, that's all. All Linux key combinations use the MOD key, as do all Windows'. However, on Linux the MOD key (which is Alt by default on Windows) is changed to right-Shift. In other words, for just about anything you used Alt for on Windows, use the right-Shift key instead -- including this.
